title: Children in town
creator_credit: Radio Sweden, Stockholm Parks Department and Centralfilm
brief_description: Stockholm, a city of nearly a million inhabitants has made considerable progress in dealing with the problem of playgrounds for children living in urban areas. Over 160 large playgrounds, most of which have facilities for both indoor and outdoor games, have been provided.
creator_credit_for_label: Radio Sweden, Stockholm Parks Department and Centralfilm
